title: Authors and Citation
text: Barbier J (2025). rtyp: R package generate Typst code. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://y-sunflower.github.io/rtyp/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {rtyp: An R package to generate Typst code},   author = {Joseph Barbier},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://y-sunflower.github.io/rtyp/}, }

what: An R package to generate Typst code
title: An R package to generate Typst code
text: rtyp, can generate Typst code dynamically. support : basic Typst functions set show rules super simple syntax

title: An R package to generate Typst code
code: library("rtyp")  heading(level = 2, numbering = "1.1", "Hello world") text(font = "Libertinus Serif", "I love cookies")

title: An R package to generate Typst code

what: Create a Typst Heading Element — heading
title: Create a Typst Heading Element — heading
text: Generates Typst code heading() element. Named arguments included Typst keyword arguments (e.g. level, numbering), unnamed arguments used heading content.

title: Create a Typst Heading Element — heading
Create a Typst Heading Element — heading
text: ... Named unnamed arguments passed Typst heading() function. Named arguments become Typst parameters (e.g. level = 2 → level: 2), unnamed arguments form body inside [...].

title: Create a Typst Heading Element — heading
text: character string containing generated Typst code.

title: Create a Typst Heading Element — heading
code: heading(level = 2, numbering = "1.1", "Hello world") #> [1] "#heading(level: 2, numbering: \"1.1\")[Hello world]" heading("Just text") #> [1] "#heading[Just text]"

what: Create a Typst Text Element — text
title: Create a Typst Text Element — text
text: Generates Typst code text() element. Named arguments included Typst keyword arguments (e.g. font), unnamed arguments used text content.

title: Create a Typst Text Element — text
Create a Typst Text Element — text
text: ... Named unnamed arguments passed Typst text() function. Named arguments become Typst parameters (e.g. font = "Libertinus Serif" → font: "Libertinus Serif"), unnamed arguments form body inside [...].

title: Create a Typst Text Element — text
text: character string containing generated Typst code.

title: Create a Typst Text Element — text
code: text(font = "Libertinus Serif", "Hello world") #> [1] "#text(font: \"Libertinus Serif\")[Hello world]" text("Just text") #> [1] "#text[Just text]"

title: Typst function generator — typst_call
text: Base function used generate higher level functions.

title: Typst function generator — typst_call
text: name Function name like heading() text() ... Additional arguments pasted typst functions.
